        layout

  Source   Edit

The main GUI module. This simply imports lots of other modules and exports what is actually needed for the end user.

Imports

gui/ecs, gui/primitives, gui/text, gui/widgets/linearlayout, gui/widgets/container, gui/widgets/label, gui/widgets/textbutton, gui/widgets/spritecamera, gui/widgets/slider, gui/widgets/progressbar, gui/widgets/buttonBehaviours, gui/widgets/scrollable, utils, gui/helpers, gui/context

    ...raises: [Exception, KeyError], tags: [RootEffect].}
Run a Flutter-like layout algorithm on the GuiElement tree, given a constraint c, and return a GuiPrimitive tree.   Source   Edit
